website_summaries.verdict: A decent quality scooter cover without a huge price tag, but not ideal for rain protection.
pros: Rust-proof copper grommets allow you to secure the cover with a lock to the front wheel
Easy to clean and also features an elastic band at the bottom for a better fit
Included buckle can be used to secure in windy weather
cons: Several buyers note that this cover is not waterproof and that a tear can develop in the seam near the buckle

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for 17 Iron 883!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits my 2017 Iron 883 like it was made for it.. perfect fit (flipped mirrors, no saddlebags yet, stock handle bars). Cannot attest to it’s durability yet, but it seems well made and is lightweight without feeling flimsy. Comes with a storage bag which will fit into a swing arm bag or saddle bag nicely. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: katie dyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, even better than my original HD cover, for a lot less $$. A must have for anyone needing to keep their bike out of the elements or just keep the dust off the paint.
customer_reviews.author: David h

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do and easy to use for my Hooligan 170 scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Satified

customer_reviews.title: ... well only time will tell with quality but seems sturdy based off almost nothing
customer_reviews.text: Fit's onto my Honda Ruckus well only time will tell with quality but seems sturdy based off almost nothing.
customer_reviews.author: alex kasper

customer_reviews.title: Fit's very snugly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover for my gsxr 600 and it fits really nice and snug. I really like the wind buckle as well, keeps the cover in place really well
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Chen

customer_reviews.title: It's Awesome if the wind doesn't blow
customer_reviews.text: If you live in a wind-Free Zone, this is the cover for you. I loved this product up until I had my first windy day. I live in the high desert in southern Cali and the first day the Santa Anna winds blew, I came out to my cover flapping in the wind only hanging on by a thread. The Wheel clamp stitching had broke and the cover was at a 90 degree angle to my motorcycle... Flapping in the wind. I've decided to spend a little more money on a more durable cover.
customer_reviews.author: Dabomb4u2

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and well built.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Kawasaki Bayou 250 perfectly. No rain or moisture gets through. Breathes enough that you don’t build up condensation. Has strong elastic bands sewn into wheel area that stretches over tires to secure. Has one adjustable belly strap. It did blow off in a severe West Texas wind storm. I added a bungee cord and it stayed on. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I have an electric scooter with back storage and this cover fits perfectly. I live one block from the beach and it is super windy and I am right in the middle of rainy/hurricane season. The cover has strap belts on either end and keeps it on awesomely. I actually charge my bike wuth the connections and charger sitting on the seat outside under the cover and it has been completely waterproof and safe even in high winds and storms. The cover is completely waterproof and keeps all elements as well as sand and dirt off of my bike. Great product and shipped in 2 days. Will buy again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hirst

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long..
customer_reviews.text: I initially liked this cover for my moped due to the fact it had holes on the bottom rear to attached to my lock. Idk why most covers on here show the holes on the front when they need to be on the back like this one, so positive for that! After 5 months of use the cover started to get long rips in it. Looks like the material gets worn and just starts ripping all over. I tried to continue to use but soon there where 2 large rips and it became unusable. Needs thicker material!
customer_reviews.author: Chanelle Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Cover ripped/broke in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for my moped and I live in Wisconsin which is not that windy ever. It was windy one day and the wind blew the cover very aggressively that it caused my moped to knock over. The buckle on the cover completely tore off and so I can no longer tie it onto my moped on one end. Honestly, kind of bummed about it especially because I've had it for less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Anna N

customer_reviews.title: Disintegrated in under a year
customer_reviews.text: The blue version of this cover held up for a couple months outside under a patio cover, but then started to rip and now has completely disintegrated in well under a year. I have one in camouflage on the lower side and black on the top side on another bike that is holding up just fine, I believe by the same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: ADV

customer_reviews.title: works on my 2019 Genunine roughhouse
customer_reviews.text: good fit durable it just went thru a sever thunderstorm and it stayed in place , 25-30 mph winds stayed in place beads the rain like water off a ducks back worth every penny i ordered the med size and it worked great good fit not too tight and not too loose has a rear plastic built in strap hook and I hooked the metal eyelets around the 90 deg valve stems held up in the storm
customer_reviews.author: G Craig

customer_reviews.title: Fits fine.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well makes a good 20 dollar gift for a scooter owner.. Made in china but who cares. Can be used on a small motorcycle or lawn mower if needed...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cover as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. I use it in my garage to keep the dust off my Burgman 200 Scooter...Very good value. Less than the local Kmart.
customer_reviews.author: Harleycharley

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits my my Harley street glide with room to spare, looks like it would fit even with my pizza box on the back, folds up small enough u could take with me on a trip and use on the road. I have only had it a few weeks now, it is easy to Install, take off, and fold. I will have to update my review after a year and let you know the durability. Great cover for the price. Only thing i dont like is heat shield appears not adequate.. I dont want to put it on when pipes are hot.
customer_reviews.author: Charles b.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but not the worst !
customer_reviews.text: The cover is adequate and the price is right . I use it to cover my scooter and transport on the back of my RV. It's not totally waterproof ! Water does leak through ( heavy morning dew ) and the grommets have pulled away from the material . You get what you pay for !
customer_reviews.author: dan reid

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it may look on this posting
customer_reviews.text: This motorcycle cover is not as heavy duty or rain repellant as shown in the picture. It is also much larger than anticipated as in the photo it says it is good for a moped, however the large gaps leave space for the wind to blow it around. I have used it on and off (but not much) for the past month and a half and have noticed that the film layer under and the actual material seems to have changed over this short amount of time and it hasn’t even experienced winter yet. I do like the clip and the lock holes although overall the material and size is cheap and not right.
customer_reviews.author: Cam Wong

customer_reviews.title: Decent but smallish
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the cover is not bad, but the size runs darily small, much smaller than you see in the picture, if you have a normal sized scooter. My cover will cover the top and some of the front and back, but only covers half of the sides. I kept it as it was snowing out and now has frozen water on the outside, but I will be orering another one to cover the area where you place your feet during riding and the sides of the scooter. Would be nice if you owned a small (Under 50CC) scooter though.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover at the end of January 2019. I live in Texas. The sun has bleached the cover. The wind has torn rips through center of the cover. The stitching has come apart around the clasp that hooks through the back tire. Do not buy this cover if you live in the heat and wind. It will not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Alysia T

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cover for my motorcycle sidecar when I'm camping. I was quoted $600 for a custom cover which wasn't going to happen. I had a specific size requirement and I took a chance on this cover doing the job. It works for my application and I'm very happy with the quality of materials and construction. Time will tell if it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Florida sun destroys
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in June 2019 and three months later his sun had completely destroyed the center of the cover long tears had developed and no longer protects the seat part of the bike. More tears are happening and now I am looking to buy another cover
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Butler Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Measure, measure!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover a Harley sportster 1200. It is very lightweight but if I had to do it over again I would order the next size bigger. It say it covers up to 90 inches, my Harley is 87 but I have mustache bars. Still it covers well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sally McMullen Mudge

customer_reviews.title: This has been great. Waterproof and has held up to many storms ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been great. Waterproof and has held up to many storms this rain season. Covers a moped with ease. The clips on the rear help to keep it on.
customer_reviews.author: sarah del paine

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Honda Forza Scooter perfect. I can tell the material will be long ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Honda Forza Scooter perfect. I can tell the material will be long lasting, I had bought one from Walmart before and the quality was not as good and ended up costing more. I recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: (Sorry if the photos are not loaded correctly that wasn’t bec of me) I have a Vespa Primavera 150 and it has a basket so I got the xl and it fits GREAT! It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Liv R

customer_reviews.title: Effective outdoor everyday cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover seems ok , it's extremely light weight , and easy on , and off the bike. I just got the m/c cover a week ago , so I can't speak of it's durability , but for the money , if it lasts 6 months , it's not bad. Snazzy colors are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Francis M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfit Fit
customer_reviews.text: Most descriptions say they fit but don't. This fits my motorcycle to the tee. Not too big, not too small. They say it will fit and it does.
customer_reviews.author: Maggies Review

customer_reviews.title: GOOD, fir What I Paid for It !
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure I got what I paid for, but I thought it would've been a little more durable !?! After about a year, it had been weakened due to constant sun exposure...which caused it to rip rather easily. It is weather RESISTANT, maybe not so much weather PROOF. Possibly would buy again, knowing the life expectancy to be short.
customer_reviews.author: RRR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scooter Cover.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the cover for three months and am very pleased. It protects my scooter, is lightweight and is easy to secure.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Even Last 4 Months
customer_reviews.text: I’ve being using this cover for less than 4 months on my 2013 KTM Duke 690 and it has already ripped in 4 different areas from normal outdoor weather conditions in the sun and wind. It’s not nearly as durable as I would have hoped for. Just cheap.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stuff
customer_reviews.text: First, it arrived very quickly. Then, it covered Linda (my bike) from head to toe, very nicely. I just got it so I don't know yet how it will perform against the elements but it looks like it can handle it. I will update my review if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: M_Lancer

customer_reviews.title: Durable fabric , great cover
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes more than ample room to cover my motorcycle has lower locking point to keep cover on in high winds or you can lock thru for theft proofing
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Pretty basic, average-low quality.
customer_reviews.text: This product's quality is very low, the aluminum pieces in the front will fall apart after a few uses, I tried 2 of this covers and both had this defect. I guess that for the price you won't get high quality.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Its ok but needs some help
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty decent cover. The only downside that I have encountered are there are no clips or straps anywhere but the tail end. It needs at least 1 near the center. I have to use a bungee cord to fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: After a week with no rain and light and variable winds, the cover hasn't yet had the opportunity to demonstrate its performance. But it covers the scooter completely and the anti-theft feature is a plus. It appears to be well-make and sturdy. I expect it will keep the scooter dry and, here in the south, it will definitely keep the pollen and dust off.
customer_reviews.author: wixway

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been through many low priced covers that are way too big, way too small and not in the least bit water resistant despite claiming so. They rip easy and suck at their job, this cover is the opposite of those. High quality for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: philip nanos

customer_reviews.title: Bad closures
customer_reviews.text: What I dont like about this cover is the closures they dont stay closed you have to really get something tight to close it. It would be so much better with closures actually attached under the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stitching has come out after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: stitching has come out after 1 week. was windy for one day. Update. We used duct tape to help cover the bike while it was raining out. That helped, But should we really need to use tape to fix the seam?

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Dont expect more than a couple months of use out of this cover if you use it outside. It will very quickly dry rot and rip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too large for a scooter.
customer_reviews.text: This over sized cover has one strap to clip it to the front wheels and two grommets near the rear wheel. There are no other systems to keep it tied to the bike. The slightest breeze fills it like a para-shoot and it blows off in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Alan

customer_reviews.title: Recomended Cover.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect fit for my Honda PCX 150. It has weathered some good storms so far and there is no damage to scooter nor the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: lasted for years so far
customer_reviews.text: as long as i'm careful not to let it get snagged it wont rip. it hasnt got much brittle, ..its still good.
customer_reviews.author: David JB

customer_reviews.title: ... the last one I bought which is still in good condition.
customer_reviews.text: Same material as the last one I bought which is still in good condition. It fits my Harley sporster good with the bags on and windshield. Was skeptical about the buckle but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Ray Snell

customer_reviews.title: No waterproof or resistant  Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof, not even water resistant. The metal rings if not held when putting the cover on will scratch your front fender
customer_reviews.author: Mik

customer_reviews.title: Fits over my electraglide ultra limited,
customer_reviews.text: Fits over my electraglide ultra limited, it’s in a garage so don’t know if is waterproof and stuff but seems to be solid enough
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my scooter.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cover purchase so i have nothing else to compare it to. With that being said, it does the job at a good price. Time will tell if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Another Watch

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this item to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for my Ninja last summer and it barely lasted for 6 months. It is not wind resistant or sun resistant, as evidenced by multiple rips and fading. Cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID B.

customer_reviews.title: Bit short even on a moped...
customer_reviews.text: Way to short it dont cover all of my moped so i dont see how it would fit a motorcycle..... other than that its fine...
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, perfect fit, great product, Super fast shipping!! Thanks...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: We used cover for our Nelix 250 Scooter. Fit perfect! Love that its waterproof and durable for Ohio weather
customer_reviews.author: Maria E White

customer_reviews.title: Ok so far
customer_reviews.text: Just brought this cover and it I holding up so far threw rain sun and all the elements
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits my Ice Bear Rocket scooter perfectly. On the ends it has clasps to keep it on the bike in windy conditions. Looks fits and works great!
customer_reviews.author: HRF

customer_reviews.title: Could’ve saved a lot headache if I had bought this first !
customer_reviews.text: This cover, far exceeds what I expected. It completely covers my 2008 Goldwing.
customer_reviews.author: Nonyo

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many motorcycles and many motorcycle covers. This one, and only one ive ever owned, degraded, faded and ripped in only a couple months. Ive never seen a bike co er fall apart and shred like this one did. I take very good care of my stuff. Any time the cover came off the bike it was folded and put in the back of my car till i wouod need it again on a rainy day for the bike. Terrible quality !
customer_reviews.author: Tessa DeLaCruz

customer_reviews.title: covered it
customer_reviews.text: I have a fairly long scooter and I was a little apprehensive about being able to get it over the whole thing; but it did the job, a little tight, and the hole for the lock gave me some grief, but it covered the whole scooter. It rained the night I put it on and it was totally dry when I came out the next day. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: brownjenkin

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't last long exposed to the sun.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it would be fine if left in the shade for a longer period of time, but I bought it a year ago and it's already destroyed. Not good for outside sunlight in California.
customer_reviews.author: J. Potter

customer_reviews.title: I like the grommets to secure the front with a cable ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my scooter, 150cc Chinese made, not overly large. Reasonably water resistant, I like the grommets to secure the front with a cable or chain and lock and the rear straps to hold down the back.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time and the product is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The material is a thinner than I expected but seems very durable. The catches to hold the cover on the scooter work well even in high wind.
customer_reviews.author: David Gignac

customer_reviews.title: This product is worth every penny you pay
customer_reviews.text: This was the best money I've ever spent. I'm absolutely satisfied and and tickled pink about my purchase. Fits my scooter perfect and so easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Well made and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an extra protection for my scooter and it works and fits it beautifully
customer_reviews.author: SammyCat

customer_reviews.title: Works great...
customer_reviews.text: Good construction and good fit. Got my money's worth, certainly. We've had some serious storms recently, and the cover stays put. I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PackerNut

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover to go over my scooter when traveling. After just 3 trips all the seems are ripped and coming apart. The material is fraying and holes are appearing. Don't waste your money not worth it at all. very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its worth the money! fits perfect,covers my moped&motorcycle good material.
customer_reviews.author: quentin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. Only had product four months and it ripped right through. Very disappointed about this product as they claim to be durable. Clearly it’s not as you can see in pictures. Product only 4 months old Don’t buy this cheap product
customer_reviews.author: Jose Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Good daily cover, but it is not weatherproof.
customer_reviews.text: Good size, seems durable but it is NOT waterproof. My goal was to find something that will keep my bike dry even in heavy rains. Unfortunately this one does not. Will keep on the lookout for a cheap one with locks.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 3 months with almost day to day use. As I commute to work and cover it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I will this again, best cover so far for the money. I like it. It pours down rain here, scooter stays quit dry.
customer_reviews.author: sheree B

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and worthless cover for scooter
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cover. Lasted one month. It cannot tolerate any wind at all. It rips at the poorly sewn seams. Do not waste your money. I searched the web and I cannot find the manufacture anywhere so that I can get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: David Booze

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: The XL 90” fits my Genuine Stella perfectly, a bit smaller would be too small and a bit bigger would he too big. It is quite thin but it’s what I was expecting for the price. Not sure if it would handle rain well, but it does the job protecting against sun, dust and night humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: although not perfect..
customer_reviews.text: 26 bucks worth it! fit for my softtail ,although not perfect....bike dry after heavy florida thunder storms.
customer_reviews.author: Rob G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: A bit thin, but fit great and does what I needed. Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.author: Dixienut

customer_reviews.title: Simple to store
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a handy bag for storage. Easy to fold up and pack and keep in the hat box. Cover had clips front and back to make sure fit is tight and windproof. All in all good value.
customer_reviews.author: tanyia kandohla

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. sun is your worst enemy
customer_reviews.text: Great cover great price covers my entire Yamaha s-max scooter with the trunk on it fits perfectly and durable
customer_reviews.author: M. Beck

customer_reviews.title: SIZE
customer_reviews.text: LITTLE BIG TO ME HONDA METROPOLITAN BUT GOOD FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R Malave

customer_reviews.title: This light weight durable scooter cover is perfect for withstanding the weather elements
customer_reviews.text: I cover my 150 buddy scooter with this cover. It protects it from the elements and the fit is great
customer_reviews.author: RKNeelly

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material for the price
customer_reviews.text: Mine lasted a whopping 4 days. 1 of the clips came off the sewing. On top of that..when I asked for a replacement..they sent me the wrong item. They have refunded me.
customer_reviews.author: joseph j bontempo

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my naked gl1100 goldwing, held up well in high winds!
customer_reviews.author: NWL

customer_reviews.title: Disposable one use motorcycle cover.
customer_reviews.text: Chain lock holes would not fit my Krptonite NY Forgetaboutit chain.
customer_reviews.author: Lite Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Product fits my scooter perfectly and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Tore right away. Grommets are cheap and came right off fabric. This fits super loose on a scooter. Don’t bother buying. Returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Weak.... the rain go through and the wind broke it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Subero

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Quality of cover was good. However much too small for the Harley Davidson I have. Despite Fatboy Harley Davidson being on the list, it only covers about 75% off the motorcycle. Definitely better off for small Harley like sporster or any sport bike.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Much thinner than I expected. Don't think it will last very long.
customer_reviews.author: julie ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the quality. I can tell this covert will not last long unless it is only used to keep dust off the bike in a garage. I will check the fitment tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for the money. It would never fit my Harley, but it fits perfectly for the bike I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Lori K

customer_reviews.title: Nice scooter cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a timely manner. It is exactly what I needed to protect my scooter. Seems pretty durable
customer_reviews.author: Candice Wood

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This cover ripped with wind after 2 months of use. I don't recommend this product to safe guard your assets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's new bike. He loves it because it is not heavy or bulky.
customer_reviews.author: cubana1946

customer_reviews.title: Size is advertised wrong
customer_reviews.text: It apears to be a good product, but its announced as a XL and its not. M at most. It might be good for a scooter of small bike but it won't fit my regular size cruizer
customer_reviews.author: lucas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit a Road Glide
customer_reviews.text: This motorcycle cover is not bad for the price. The cover does not fit a Harley Road Glide. It will cover the bike but it leaves the sides up high and allows wind, dust and pollen to easy blow under the cover. I am sure it would work better for a bike with no fairing. Otherwise a good cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be thicker
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Came packaged very nicely and works like a charm for my Kawasaki ninja. However very bad with wind as it ripped apart on a windy night although it was fastened tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Theophilus Nartey

customer_reviews.title: Weather Proof
customer_reviews.text: I leave my bike outside and it has stayed dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even though the cover's length is adequate, the height ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though the cover's length is adequate, the height is not. Since the cover does not reach the bottom of the scooter, it's not possible to attach a lock to the front wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Bueno

customer_reviews.title: it looks nice and so far does the job
customer_reviews.text: it looks nice and so far does the job. Our weather takes a toll on everything, but I'll be able to give a complete account of its wearability by next fall.
customer_reviews.author: debra carr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Fit well. Protected the scooter great during a recent snow storm.
customer_reviews.author: SHWM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality item!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice way to protect my bike from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Minkler

customer_reviews.title: misleading
customer_reviews.text: I have a midsize BMW F750. The pictured size is not what you get. What you get is a small cover that does not cover the entire bike. DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: product much better than the last one I bought for much more
customer_reviews.text: Very Quick response to the order, product much better than the last one I bought for much more.
customer_reviews.author: Mke

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Its for really small bicks dose not fit touring bikes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Great cover. Nice fit on my 2016 Harley street glide.
customer_reviews.author: john rogers

product_meta.title: Motorcycle Cover Waterproof Motorbike Scooter Shelter Outdoor Dustproof All Weather Protection, Anti-theft Copper Lock Hole for Honda Kawasaki Yamaha Suzuki Harley Davidson Black 90.5"x37''x49'' XL
feature_bullets: XL 90" Size:90.5"x37"x49", Our cover fits most on and off-road standard-sized bikes

2 COPPER LOCKHOLES [NEVER RUST] & WINDPROOF BUCKL: The front wheel position increased 4CM copper anti-theft lock hole.The bottom of motorcycle cover completely around 2 CM high elastic band.The rear wheel position is provided with a windbreak buckle.which help lock your motor and to better fix

QUALITY MATERIALS：High-density waterproof polyester 190T(Waterproof means waterproof drops,can not be storage water), stable and ultra-tight,Improved weather protection, Protect your motorcycle against rain, dust, heat, tree sap, damaging UV rays & inclement weather with top to bottom coverage
Perfect for protecting your motorcycle from pollutants, sun UV rays, dust, dirt, snow, rain, bird droppings and other damages. Comes with a storage bag; Package: 1x Motorcycle cover; 1x Storage bag

STORAGE BAG：Keep the cover properly,do not worry to use this everywhere. ADVANTAGE Protect your motorcycle against rain, dust, heat, tree sap, damaging UV rays & inclement weather with top to bottom coverage
